column2: Heavy breathing noticed 7/8/21, slow moving and enlarged head on 7/9/21
Small primary tumor above skull (t1) and internal tumor near heart/lungs (T2)

Right lung was severely inflamed and swollen, looked to be about 3x the size of the left lung. Nodules on left lung noticed, as well as nodules in the periphery of the heart/lungs. 0.25cm tumor taken from lung periphery. Primary tumor above skull was relatively small, and seemed to be disseminated over a large area.
